ovdesc.p: This Application is used to define the different field values.For every field there will be a record with its various values, and there will be a record for the WORKFLOW, this will have the different functions for the script and the different script groups

desc.p: Only two values are allowed. They are, FIELD.VALUES and WORKFLOW
Description of the record, what the record is used for it can be either for field values or it will be a workflow.This is a mandatory field with minimum of 3 and a maximum of 35 characters .

This will have the different values for the field if FIELD.VALUES is specified in VALUES.TYPE field or it will have the different functions and its SCRIPT.GROUP if WORKFLOW is specified. Upto 35 characters are allowed.
Any ID with Alpha-Numeric values . Upto 75 characters are allowed.
This field will have the description for the Field values that has been specified. This is a mandatory field. Upto 50 chararecters are allowed.
